title: WCAS AFST 390-0-24 Topics in African Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
AFST 390-0-24 "North African Literature in the Age of Social Media" (MENA 390-6-21) Driss Kisikes (Spring 2017)


The aim of this seminar is to discuss a series of texts (poems, novels, short stories) written between 2005 and 2015, not only as literary products but as signs, predicting, mirroring or symbolizing social, cultural and political transformations. The materials will comprise edited writings (translated into english) but also parallel media documents, which help understand literature in context.

subject: AFST
